Header.title: We are a Landing Page
paragraph: The Department of Biochemistry is designed to prepare students for basic and general knowledge skills in varous areas of biochemistry which they can harness to function in biotechnology, analytical chemistry, environmental science.

Biochemistry is a life-science discipline basic to cellular biology, genetics, bioinformactics, medicine, dentistry, pharmacy, biotechnology, physiotherapy, biological sciences, agriculture, nutrition, and food science.

The Department of Biochemistry is designed to prepare students for basic and general knowledge skills in varous areas of biochemistry which they can harness to function in biotechnology, analytical chemistry, environmental science.

Biochemistry is a life-science discipline basic to cellular biology, genetics, bioinformactics, medicine, dentistry, pharmacy, biotechnology, physiotherapy, biological sciences, agriculture, nutrition, and food science.

The academic members of staff are very effective as lecturers and professional researchers. They have contributed to the training of all the Doctors and Dentists, Physiotherapists, Pharmacists, Pharmacologist and Microbiologists who have graduated from the University of Lagos.
